fn.p: Author contributions M.S., J.F., O.S., N.B., K.B.-G., D.M.D., C.F.D., T.H., I.K. and C.H. conceived general ideas. O.S., E.W., H.B., A.H., M.K., I.K., D.M., S.M.-S., P.R., J.S., A.V., M.W. and C.H. contributed distribution data. M.S., J.F., J.A., M.A., M.B., G.B., N.B., N.E., N.F., A.K., M.P., A.S. and C.N.W. contributed network data. M.S., J.F., O.S., E.W. and C.H. analysed the data. M.S. and C.H. wrote the manuscript. All authors discussed the results and commented on the manuscript.
